mapper.insert: insert into feed set writer_user_id = #{writerUserId}, contents = #{contents}, location = #{location}
mapper.select: SELECT a.feed_id AS feedId, writer_user_id AS writerUserId, if(nick_name IS NULL , uid, nick_name) AS writerNm, pic AS writerPic, contents, location, a.created_at AS createdAt, if(c.feed_id IS NULL ,0 , 1) AS isLike FROM feed A JOIN user B ON a.writer_user_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN feed_like c ON a.feed_id = c.feed_id AND c.user_id = #{signedUserId} ORDER BY a.feed_id DESC LIMIT #{sIdx},#{size}
